explains: n. （尤指旧时的）武士，勇士；（瑜伽体式）战士
wordGroup: dragon warrior 龙战士；龙之武士（功夫熊猫中的称号）；神龙大侠；龙勇士

sentences.en: New Zealand's quarrel with France over the Rainbow Warrior incident was formally ended.
sentences.cn: 新西兰和法国之间关于“彩虹勇士号”事件的争端已经正式了结。

sentences.en: The fighting transforms him into a warrior.
sentences.cn: 战斗使他成为一名战士。

sentences.en: Governing terrain and choosing your battlefields are perhaps the most crucial skills of a wise and successful warrior.
sentences.cn: 控制地形和选择战场可能是一个明智和成功的战士最重要的技能。
